steps.title: Remove the bean sprouts from the packaging bag.
steps.content: Remove the bean sprouts from the packaging bag.

steps.title: Place the bean sprouts in a bowl.
steps.content: Place the bean sprouts in a bowl. The bowl needs to be large enough to take both the sprouts and water that will cover them.

steps.title: Fill the bowl with water.
steps.content: Fill the bowl with water. Pour enough to cover the sprouts with water.

steps.title: Add a few slices of lemon.
steps.content: Add a few slices of lemon. The water and the lemon will keep the bean sprouts fresh for longer.

steps.title: Choose a container that is airtight and large enough to fit the amount of sprouts intended for storage.
steps.content: Choose a container that is airtight and large enough to fit the amount of sprouts intended for storage.

steps.title: Place two layers of either cheesecloth or kitchen paper towels on the base of the container.
steps.content: Place two layers of either cheesecloth or kitchen paper towels on the base of the container. This lining will absorb all excess moisture.

steps.title: Tip the bean sprouts into the container.
steps.content: Tip the bean sprouts into the container.

steps.title: Put the lid on.
steps.content: Put the lid on. Place in the refrigerator for short storage.
